text: James William "Jim" Ross (born January 3, 1951) is an American professional wrestling commentator. He is currently signed to All Elite Wrestling (AEW). He is also known by his nicknames Good Ol' J.R. or simply J.R.. Ross is a restaurateur, former professional wrestling commentator and former company executive. He is most well known for working for World Wrestling Entertainment (WWE) as a play-by-play commentator. He was born in Fort Bragg, California. He was inducted into the WWE Hall of Fame in 2007 and is widely regarded as one of the greatest commentators in wrestling history. On April 3, 2019, Ross signed a three-year contract with All Elite Wrestling (AEW). ==Personal life== Ross has Bell's palsy. In October 2021, Ross tweeted that he was diagnosed with skin cancer. Two months later, Ross tweeted that he was cancer free. ==References== Category:1952 births Category:Living people Category:All Elite Wrestling people Category:American bloggers Category:American television presenters Category:People from Jacksonville, Florida Category:Professional wrestling announcers Category:Professional wrestling referees Category:Restaurateurs Category:Sportspeople from California Category:Sportspeople from Oklahoma Category:Sportspeople from Florida Category:WWE executives Category:WWE Hall of Fame Category:WWE people
title: Jim Ross
